## Exercise

Data set: 7 samples (PBMMC & ETV6-RUNX1) - all cells. So far:

* QC & Filtering
* Normalisation
* Feature Selection and Dimension Reduction
* Batch Correction

Start with the object *Caron_batch_corrected.all_cells.rds*:

* Run `clusterSweep` using three algorithms and a range of values for `k`
* Examine the results using cluster behaviour metrics and select one to proceed with
* Identify cluster marker genes using `scoreMarkers`
